content:
A ValueSet which includes codes from two CodeSystems results in an expansion within the IG which also includes the column System (probably based on ValueSet.expansion.contains.system).

Beneath the table the "Explanation of the columns that may appear on this page:" contains

  • Level
  • Source
  • Code
  • Display
  • Definition
  • Comments

Is System equivalent to Source? If not, would it be possible to add System to the explanation list?
Seems that 'Source' should be 'System'. Can you submit a Git issue here: https://github.com/HL7/fhir-ig-publisher/issues
@Lloyd McKenzie this is a template issue: https://github.com/HL7/ig-template-base/pull/185
Ok. Merged. Will be fixed the next time we do a release.
Gabriel Kleinoscheg has marked this topic as resolved.
